body.p: Because future cash flows are estimated for the asset in its current condition, value in use does not reflect:

li.p: future cash outflows or related cost savings (for example reductions in staff costs) or benefits that are expected to arise from a future restructuring to which an entity is not yet committed; or
future cash outflows that will improve or enhance the asset’s performance or the related cash inflows that are expected to arise from such outflows.
